sections.heading: refund; denial; appeal.The denial, in whole or in part, of a claim for refund shall be considered a final action of the Tax Commissioner
sections.text: The denial may be appealed, and the appeal shall be in accordance with the Administrative Procedure Act.SourceLaws 1987, LB 523, ยง 40;Laws 1988, LB 352, ยง 158.Cro
